ref: 14576 *tr̥pu -- : Kt. trü ʻ curdled milk ʼ, trü -- ʻ to curdle ʼ; Ash. truga -- zū ʻ sour milk ʼ, Pr. čüū. -- Sv. luǰ -- ʻ to become sour ʼ (< *tr̥pūya -- ?) in luǰij̈ilo (c̣hīr) ʻ sour milk ʼ (lužizilo NOPhal 50), Gaw luzan -- c̣hīr, luzizan -- < *luzi -- san (absol. in -- i of luz -- with pres. part. *santa<-> (Buddruss).
